name: Viral Infection (Skill Card)
text:
Kaiba / Skill
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Skill Effect ]Once per turn, discard any number of cards and declare 1 type of card (Monster, Spell, or Trap).
Your opponent sends 1 card of the declared type from their Deck to the GY for each discarded card.
If you do that, flip this card over.
